mean_en: (not used in the progressive tenses) if somebody/something deserves something, it is right that they should have it, because of the way they have behaved or because of what they are
sentence: She deserves such a high ranking because of her popularity.
sentence_trans: 以她的高人气，她应该得到这样的名次。
word_etyma: de加强语气 + serve为…服务 → deserve值得，应得
